column4: i'd like to know, when having ubuntu+windows on a system, if there's a risk for the windows personal data files to be accessed from ubuntu (via the inter/network) and vice versa.
no risk. as long as you do not mount it, ubuntu will not acces a windows partition.
what is mounting? and also how does ubuntu get installed from within windows (inside the ntfs partition?)
installing inside windows, you use WUBI for that.
